cmp: 亲 (dear/intimate/parent/relation/closely related, parents-in-law of one's offspring)
mng: parent, one's own (flesh and blood), relative, related, marriage, bride, close, intimate, in person, first-hand, in favor of, pro-, to kiss, (Internet slang) dear

exm.mng: parent, one's own (flesh and blood), relative, related, marriage, bride, close, intimate, in person, first-hand, in favor of, pro-, to kiss, (Internet slang) dear
parent and child, parent-child (relationship), two successive generations
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
amiable, cordial, close and dear, familiar
one's own mouth, fig. in one's own words, to say sth personally
fellow countryman (from the same village), local people, villager, the folks back home
